<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   tgtptr:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     .quad 0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This edge kind has the same fixup expression as BranchPCRel32, but further</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// identifies the call/branch as being to a pointer jump stub. For edges of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// this kind the jump stub should not be bypassed (use</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// BranchPCRel32ToPtrJumpStubBypassable for that), but the pointer location</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// target may be recorded to allow manipulation at runtime.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Fixup expression:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   Fixup &lt;- Target - Fixup + Addend : int32</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Errors:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - The result of the fixup expression must fit into an int32, otherwise</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     an out-of-range error will be returned.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/i386/#ab5b12c7ab25aac492521ed299ab357d4a645439244937f896e50b86e2de4f90a0"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/i386/#ab5b12c7ab25aac492521ed299ab357d4a645439244937f896e50b86e2de4f90a0">BranchPCRel32ToPtrJumpStub</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A relaxable version of BranchPCRel32ToPtrJumpStub.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The edge kind has the same fixup expression as BranchPCRel32ToPtrJumpStub,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// but identifies the call/branch as being to a pointer jump stub that may be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// bypassed with a direct jump to the ultimate target if the ultimate target</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is within range of the fixup location.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Fixup expression:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   Fixup &lt;- Target - Fixup + Addend : int32</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Errors:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - The result of the fixup expression must fit into an int32, otherwise</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     an out-of-range error will be returned.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/i386/#ab5b12c7ab25aac492521ed299ab357d4a032d3ec55a73bf3dd3dde3c7c15cd1d8"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/i386/#ab5b12c7ab25aac492521ed299ab357d4a032d3ec55a73bf3dd3dde3c7c15cd1d8">BranchPCRel32ToPtrJumpStubBypassable</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns a string name for the given i386 edge. For debugging purposes</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">/// only</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/i386/#af34d9ccf9d307a0f17db132d098383ec">getEdgeKindName</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/edge/#af18145da213e6c4033b368d657e80baa">Edge::Kind</a> K);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Optimize the GOT and Stub relocations if the edge target address is in range</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1 PCRel32GOTLoadRelaxable. For this edge kind, if the target is in range,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="comment">/// then replace GOT load with lea. (THIS IS UNIMPLEMENTED RIGHT NOW!)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2 BranchPCRel32ToPtrJumpStubRelaxable. For this edge kind, if the target is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><Highlight kind="comment">/// in range, replace a indirect jump by plt stub with a direct jump to the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><Highlight kind="comment">/// target</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/jitlink/i386/#a877b3d728be6b7084aef27f92242f8bf">optimizeGOTAndStubAccesses</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/jitlink/linkgraph">LinkGraph</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
